sect2.title: FHS compliance notes
sect2.para: The FHS recommends that we use /var/lib/hwclock as the location of the adjtime file, instead of the usual /etc. To make hwclock, which is part of the util-linux package, FHS-compliant, run the following.

screen.userinput: cp hwclock/hwclock.c hwclock/hwclock.c.backup && sed 's%etc/adjtime%var/lib/hwclock/adjtime%' \ hwclock/hwclock.c.backup > hwclock/hwclock.c && mkdir -p /var/lib/hwclock
